title: Divine madness
brief_description: Shot on location at the Pasadena Civic Auditorium, this live performance by Bette Midler along with “The Harlettes” (Jocelyn Brown, Ula Hedwig and Diva Gray) features some great raunchy comedy material along with some of Bette Midler’s most popular songs including Boogie Woogie Bugle Boy, Chapel of Love, The Rose, Do You Want to Dance.
